Level shoes Exclusive Sale just got better

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1700&user=10620> 	

Sale prices have dropped even further with an exclusive 70% off on select sale items, available both online and in-store for Chalhoub Group team members.

To redeem in-store, present your Chalhoub ID or One Chalhoub profile at checkout. For online shopping <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1700&user=10620> , log in with your Chalhoub Group email ID, and the discount will be applied at checkout.
T&Cs: Offer valid on select items and brands (non-concession). Sale items are final.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Give Your Style a Second Life with reMUSE

Give Your Style a Second Life with reMUSE 

reMUSE makes reselling effortless. List your luxury pieces in just a few steps and pass them on to someone new — while making space for what’s next in your wardrobe. It’s simple, seamless, and stylish — a smarter way to shop, sell, and support circular fashion. 

Because great taste never goes out of style — it just finds a new home. Resell Toda <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1701&user=10620> y.
